comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of packs of ramen and y be the number of packs of fries the salesman eats, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "Calories constraint: 400x + 300y \geq 3000",
        "Protein constraint: 20x + 10y \geq 80",
        "Sodium constraint: 100x + 75y \leq S",
        "Percentage constraint: x \leq 0.3(x+y)",
        "Non-negativity constraint: x, y \geq 0, integers"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize sodium intake: Minimize 100x + 75y"
}
